item.description:
i would like to post is for this Friday dec 21. 3-4:30 pm. i will send my address to those who rsvp yes. dont want to put my address on meetup.com

I am hosting a meditation sitting at my home in Willimantic. Come and turn your attention within. We will use some guided breathing through audio cd to allow the mind to settle in and then sit in silent meditation for about an hour. Prior experience with meditation is not necessary. There is no cost involved . Seasoned meditators or curious about meditation , all are welcome

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Meditation
